title: Rising Edge Scope Capture (Code 400h to C00h)
summary: Oscilloscope capture of rising-edge transition with zoomed post-step behavior and trigger pulse.

structured_data.description: Annotated as rising edge 2 V/div with zoomed rising edge 100 uV/div, trigger pulse 5 V/div, time base 5 us/div, transition from code 400h to C00h.
